resources.string:
Hi, I am Taufan Erfiyanto. I am an Athletic Android Engineer & UI Designer. 

Experiences in developing Android applications in a wide range of industries such as e-commerce, point of sales, on-demand service, and fintech.Currently, I am leading a development team to develop a merchant application.

I am also interested in designing UI/UX. You can find my design work on microstock marketplaces such as Envato, labs, and ui8.

While not coding & designing, I mostly spend time reading books or playing games.
